    public abstract class Context<THIS extends Context<THIS>>
extends java.lang.Object
    /** This class describes something that contains resources for the step performing. These steps are described by SequentialActionSupplier and SequentialGetStepSupplier generally. "Resources" are opened data base connections, opened browsers etc.

      • getInstance

        protected static <T extends Context<?>> T getInstance​(java.lang.Class<T> toInstantiate)
        This is the utility method that helps to create a thread-safe proxy instance with byte-buddy tools.

        IT IS IMPORTANT

        It is required for a class to have the default constructor or to be annotated by CreateWith
        Type Parameters:
        T - is a type that extends Context
        Parameters:
        toInstantiate - is a class to create instance of
        Returns:
        a new proxy-instance

      • absenceOf

        protected final boolean absenceOf​(SequentialGetStepSupplier<THIS,​?,​?,​?,​?> toBeAbsent,
                                  java.time.Duration timeOut)
        Retrieves whenever some object is absent or not.
        Parameters:
        toBeAbsent - is a supplier of a function that retrieves a value
        timeOut - is a time to wait for value is absent. WARNING!!! When toBePresent has a defined time out then it is ignored in favour of a time defined by the method.
        Returns:
        is an object absent or not

      • absenceOf

        protected final boolean absenceOf​(SequentialGetStepSupplier<THIS,​?,​?,​?,​?> toBeAbsent,
                                  java.time.Duration timeOut,
                                  java.lang.String exceptionMessage)
        Retrieves whenever some object is absent or not.
        Parameters:
        toBeAbsent - is a supplier of a function that retrieves a value
        timeOut - is a time to wait for value is absent. WARNING!!! When toBePresent has a defined time out then it is ignored in favour of a time defined by the method
        exceptionMessage - is a message of IllegalStateException to be thrown when value is present
        Returns:
        is an object absent or not

                                  java.time.Duration timeOut,
                                  java.lang.String exceptionMessage)
        Retrieves whenever some object is absent or not.
        Parameters:
        toBeAbsent - is a function that retrieves a value
        timeOut - is a time to wait for value is absent.
        exceptionMessage - is a message of IllegalStateException to be thrown when value is present
